    Black Aracnia laughed as Grim Reaper began to charge at her. She fired 
three more missles at him, and with her 'spider leg machine guns' began to 
sweep  the battle field.
    Paralysis continued to fire at Rush. He tried to take a few shots at his 
head, but settled for his stomach.

    Aerostreak emerged behinde Black Aracnia and Paralysis. Following him 
were Adrax, Grappler, Guantix, Nighteyes, Paddletail, and Aquarious. Aracnia 
turned to see them with surprize.
    "What the hell?" She snapped, aiming her gun at them.
    "I am Adrax. Im sure you know me. I met these Predacons who wish to join 
you agianst the Maximals. Also, they have tree Maximals prisoners." He said, 
gruffly.
    Black Aracnia tossed he idea in her head around, but then a pulse flair 
shot just over her head and she had to make a snap decision. "Alright, we'll 
take them! Adrax take them into the ship and we will talk alter. Secure the 
Maximals first and foremost."
